id.label: Task ID
id.explainer: Unique identifier for the warehouse task. This UUID is automatically generated for each task configuration.

taskKind.label: Task Kind
taskKind.explainer: Defines the type of task in the WMS. Changing this will auto-populate fields with appropriate defaults for the selected task type.

taskSubKind.label: Task Sub-Kind
taskSubKind.explainer: Specific subcategory of tasks, related to this outbound tasks.

taskAttrs.label: Task Attributes
taskAttrs.explainer: Additional task attributes as key-value pairs for extended configuration.

storageIdentifiers.label: Storage Identifiers
storageIdentifiers.explainer: Identifiers for storage categories, SKU class, unit of measure, and bucket. Strategy apply to these defined identifiers only.

lineIdentifiers.label: Line Identifiers
lineIdentifiers.explainer: Identifier for the task's line, like channel.

strat.label: Strategy
strat.explainer: Picking Task is created by the according to this defined strategy. Eg: In PICK_BY_CUSTOMER the picking task is grouped by Customer.

loadingStrategy.label: Loading Strategy
loadingStrategy.explainer: Strategy for loading operations, either by customer grouping or by trip grouping.

groupBy.label: Group By
groupBy.explainer: Defines the grouping strategy for items.

sequence.label: Sequence
sequence.explainer: Priority of the task. Lower number means higher priority.

taskLabel.label: Task Label
taskLabel.explainer: Used to display the task label in the app.

tripType.label: Trip Type
tripType.explainer: Type of trip, either Last Mile or Mid Mile.

mapSegregationGroupsToBins.label: Map Segregation Groups to Bins
mapSegregationGroupsToBins.explainer: Controls bin segregation in Gen3 system.

dropHUInBin.label: Drop HU in Bin
dropHUInBin.explainer: Determines if the entire HU will be dropped in the bin. Default is true.

scanDestHUInDrop.label: Scan Destination HU in Drop
scanDestHUInDrop.explainer: Requires scanning of destination HU when dropping partial quantities into bins.

scanSourceHUKind.label: Scan Source HU Kind
scanSourceHUKind.explainer: Defines the source HU type for scanning.

pickSourceHUKind.label: Pick Source HU Kind
pickSourceHUKind.explainer: Defines the source HU type for picking.

carrierHUKind.label: Carrier HU Kind
carrierHUKind.explainer: Defines the HU type for the carrier.

useDockdoorAssignment.label: Use Dockdoor Assignment
useDockdoorAssignment.explainer: Controls dockdoor assignment for outbound tasks.

params.label: Parameters
params.explainer: Various parameters related to replenishment, like bin-pallet capacity and handling units (replenishBin, replenishBundles, replenishBundlesOnly, etc.).

strictBatchAdherence.label: Strict Batch Adherence
strictBatchAdherence.explainer: Enforces batch adherence during picking, critical for outbound batch tasks.

allowWorkOrderSplit.label: Allow Work Order Split
allowWorkOrderSplit.explainer: Allows work order splitting during picking.

undoOp.label: Undo Operation
undoOp.explainer: Determines whether undo operations are allowed. Not applicable for WORM flow.

disableWorkOrder.label: Disable Work Order
disableWorkOrder.explainer: Disable the work order during the task.

allowUnpick.label: Allow Unpick
allowUnpick.explainer: Allows unpicking of items from the pallet.

loadingUnits.label: Loading Units
loadingUnits.explainer: Defines the units used for loading.

pickMandatoryScan.label: Pick Mandatory Scan
pickMandatoryScan.explainer: Determines if scanning is mandatory for picking.

dropMandatoryScan.label: Drop Mandatory Scan
dropMandatoryScan.explainer: Scan is mandatory during the drop process.

dropUOM.label: Drop UOM
dropUOM.explainer: Defines the unit of measure for dropping.

allowComplete.label: Allow Complete
allowComplete.explainer: Automatically marks the task as complete once finished.

swapHUThreshold.label: Swap HU Threshold
swapHUThreshold.explainer: Defines the threshold for swapping HU between source and carrier pallets (0 to 1).

dropInnerHU.label: Drop Inner HU
dropInnerHU.explainer: Allows dropping of inner HUs during task completion.

allowInnerHUBreak.label: Allow Inner HU Break
allowInnerHUBreak.explainer: Permits breaking of inner HUs during the task.

displayDropUOM.label: Display Drop UOM
displayDropUOM.explainer: Whether to display the UOM during drop.

autoUOMConversion.label: Auto UOM Conversion
autoUOMConversion.explainer: Automatically converts UOMs during replenishment tasks.

mobileSorting.label: Mobile Sorting
mobileSorting.explainer: Enables sorting during drop process for outbound tasks in Gen3.

sortingParam.label: Sorting Parameter
sortingParam.explainer: Defines parameters for sorting (LM, customer order, delivery order, etc.).

quantSlottingForHUsInDrop.label: Quantity Slotting for HUs in Drop
quantSlottingForHUsInDrop.explainer: Whether quantity slotting is required for HUs during drop.

allowPickingMultiBatchfromHU.label: Allow Picking Multi-Batch from HU
allowPickingMultiBatchfromHU.explainer: Allows picking from a pallet containing multiple batches. Default is false.

displayEditPickQuantity.label: Display Edit Pick Quantity
displayEditPickQuantity.explainer: Displays an option to edit picked quantity during picking operations.

pickBundles.label: Pick Bundles
pickBundles.explainer: Allows picking from bundles directly from reserve. Relevant for replenishment tasks.

groupByValues.label: Group By Values
groupByValues.explainer: Defines areas that need to be grouped together for work order formation. Specific area codes.

enableEditQtyInPickOp.label: Enable Edit Quantity in Pick Operation
enableEditQtyInPickOp.explainer: Allows editing the quantity during picking.

enableManualDestBinSelection.label: Enable Manual Destination Bin Selection
enableManualDestBinSelection.explainer: Allows manual selection of destination bins during drop.
